mapper.select: /*PortalMapper.selectCommCodeList bnso*/ SELECT CODE ,CODE_NM_kOR FROM T_CMMN_BASIS_CODE WHERE PARENT_CODE = #{code} AND USE_AT = '1'
/*PortalMapper.selectUserInfo bnso*/ SELECT USER_NO ,USER_ID ,PASSWORD ,USER_NAME ,TEL_NO FROM T_USER_INFORMATION WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_TENANT_USER ( USER_NO , TENANT_ID , ASSIGN_DATETIME , TENANT_ADMINISTRATOR_YN , REGISTRATION_TENANT_YN , TENANT_ESNTL_ID , CREAT_ID , CREAT_DT , CREAT_IP , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DT , UPDT_IP ) VALUES ( #{userNo} , #{tenantId} , NULL , 1 , 0 , NULL , #{userId} , SYSDATE() , #{creatIp} , #{userId} , SYSDATE() , #{creatIp} )
mapper.select: /*PortalMapper.selectMyTenantList 나의 테넌트 목록 조회 bnso*/ select tt.TENANT_ID ,tt.TENANT_NM_KOR ,tt.TENANT_CL ,(SELECT CODE_NM_KOR FROM t_cmmn_basis_code WHERE CODE = TT.TENANT_CL) AS TENANT_CL_NM ,tt.TENANT_DTL_CL ,(SELECT CODE_NM_KOR FROM t_cmmn_basis_code WHERE CODE = TT.TENANT_DTL_CL) AS TENANT_DTL_CL_NM ,tt.TENANT_NM_KOR ,tt.TENANT_NM_ENG ,tt.TENANT_REPRSNT_ID ,tt.REPRSNT_EMAIL ,tt.ZIP_NO ,tt.ADDRESS ,tt.REPRSNT_TELNO ,tt.CHARGER_MOBILE ,tt.CHARGER_ID ,tt.CHARGER_NM from t_tenant tt ,t_tenant_user ttu ,t_user_information tui where TT.TENANT_ID = TTU.TENANT_ID and ttu.USER_NO = tui.user_no and TUI.USER_ID = #{userId} and tt.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId}

/*PortalMapper.selectUserInfo 나의 테넌트에서 신청한 서비스 목록 조회 bnso*/
SELECT A.TENANT_ID , A.SVC_ID , B.SVC_NM_KOR , C.FARE_SE_CODE , E.CODE_NM_KOR AS FARE_SE_CODE_NM , A.FARE_AMOUNT , IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(A.COL, '%Y-%m-%d'), '') AS START_DT , IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(CASE WHEN C.FARE_UNIT_CODE = 'C015001' THEN DATE_ADD(A.COL, INTERVAL 1 YEAR) WHEN C.FARE_UNIT_CODE = 'C015002' THEN DATE_ADD(A.COL, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) ELSE NULL END, '%Y-%m-%d'), '') AS END_DT , C.FARE_UNIT_CODE , A.USE_AT FROM T_TENANT_SVC A INNER JOIN T_SVC_MASTER B ON A.SVC_ID = B.SVC_ID INNER JOIN T_SVC_FARE C ON A.SVC_ID = C.SVC_ID AND A.FARE_CODE = C.FARE_CODE INNER JOIN T_TENANT_USER D ON A.TENANT_ID = D.TENANT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN T_CMMN_BASIS_CODE E ON C.FARE_SE_CODE = E.CODE WHERE D.USER_NO = #{userNo}

/*PortalMapper.selectServiceList 메인페이지 서비스 과금 조회 gjahn*/ SELECT A.SVC_ID , A.SVC_SE_CODE , A.SVC_ATRB_CODE , B.FARE_SE_CODE , B.FARE_SE_CODE_NM , B.YEAR_ACCOUNT , B.MONTH_ACCOUNT FROM T_SVC_MASTER A INNER JOIN ( SELECT SA.SVC_ID , SA.FARE_SE_CODE , MAX(SB.CODE_NM_KOR) as FARE_SE_CODE_NM , MAX(CASE WHEN SA.FARE_UNIT_CODE = 'C015002' THEN SA.FARE_ACCOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS MONTH_ACCOUNT , MAX(CASE WHEN SA.FARE_UNIT_CODE = 'C015001' THEN SA.FARE_ACCOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS YEAR_ACCOUNT , MAX(SB.SORT_NO) AS SORT_NO FROM T_SVC_FARE SA INNER JOIN T_CMMN_BASIS_CODE SB ON SA.FARE_SE_CODE = SB.CODE WHERE SVC_ID = #{svcId} GROUP BY SVC_ID, FARE_SE_CODE ) B ON A.SVC_ID = B.SVC_ID ORDER BY B.SORT_NO

/*PortalMapper.selectMyTenantComboList 서비스결제 테넌트 콤보조회 gjahn*/ SELECT A.TENANT_ID , A.TENANT_NM_KOR FROM T_TENANT A INNER JOIN T_TENANT_USER B ON A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID INNER JOIN T_USER_INFORMATION C ON B.USER_NO = C.USER_NO WHERE C.USER_ID = #{userId}

/*PortalMapper.selectServiceList 메인페이지 서비스 과금 조회 gjahn*/ SELECT A.SVC_ID , A.SVC_SE_CODE , A.SVC_ATRB_CODE , B.FARE_SE_CODE , B.FARE_CODE , C.CODE_NM_KOR AS FARE_SE_CODE_NM , B.FARE_UNIT_CODE , D.CODE_NM_KOR AS FARE_UNIT_CODE_NM , B.FARE_ACCOUNT AS FARE_AMOUNT FROM T_SVC_MASTER A INNER JOIN T_SVC_FARE B ON A.SVC_ID = B.SVC_ID INNER JOIN T_CMMN_BASIS_CODE C ON B.FARE_SE_CODE = C.CODE INNER JOIN T_CMMN_BASIS_CODE D ON B.FARE_UNIT_CODE = D.CODE WHERE A.SVC_ID = #{svcId} ORDER BY B.FARE_SE_CODE, B.FARE_UNIT_CODE
